title: Interview: Kerry Sautner of the National Constitution Center
itunes:title: Interview: Kerry Sautner of the National Constitution Center
description:
Holly is joined by Kerry Sautner, Chief Learning Officer of the National Constitution Center, to discuss the museum's mission, unlikely career paths to history, and how talking about the Constitution brings people together.

You can visit the National Constitution Center at: https://constitutioncenter.org/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
